  • Method Details

    • checkOrders

      public void checkOrders()
      Method used to print every order a courier has received from the core

    • acceptOrder

      public ArrayList<Order> acceptOrder(int orderID)
      Method used by a Courier to accept a certain order he received
      Parameters:
      orderID - ID of the order (unique)
      Returns:
      the list of other orders he received that are automatically denied upon acceptance of a particular order, so that they can be treated again by the core.

    • deliveredOrder

      public void deliveredOrder()
      Method used by a Courier to inform the system that he has delivered his order. The method then sets his state as on-duty again and updates his address.
